tool_description: Amazon data scraper is a easy way to know amazon product details, price, brand, features and, reviews.
name: Aditi Amazon Data Scraper
title: Aditi Amazon Data Scraper

api_list.name: Get Amazon Product Details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aditi-amazon-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/products/B08N5N6RSS"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aditi-amazon-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://aditi-amazon-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/products/{productid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aditi-amazon-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
